text: I think this was mentioned before I know I would love if the automatic line breaks/spacing when adding elements was removed, I dont think many people code out items like this (though I could be wrong)
ask <@U7SL518D6>’s new developer if he/she codes this way.  seems to be on fleek with the new coding styles :slightly_smiling_face:
Yes! Not a fan of this.

Would be nice if there was a way to easily see which templates are in use. You can currently go in and see on each template whether they’re being used, but it’d be great if there was a listing of which templates were in use and then maybe an easy way to see which pages they are used on.

I might be the only one on this, but it seems a little presuptious that we might use the same template for our blog home as we would post listings. Would be nice to break those out without having to go ape with if/then statements. If I am the only one on this, I'll shut up. :wink:
You can, Its build into the system
